name: Space Invaders: Awesome Per Second Edition
name_original: Space Invaders: Awesome Per Second Edition
description:
Use the left and right arrow buttons to move and press the spacebar to shoot. The objective is to defeat the enemy ships while preventing them from reaching your location.

This is a project I made for the Extra Credits Game Jam. Since the theme was Awesome per Second, I made a game where as little time was wasted as possible. Since I had unexpected personal events come up during development, I wasn't able to complete this game to its fullest. Despite that, I am very proud of the game I have created.
